examples.example: 只要我们每个人都付出一分努力，这个世界就会变得更加美好。

translate.english: As long as each of us makes a little effort, the world will become more beautiful.

examples.example: 我会用一分一秒的时间去努力提升自己。

translate.english: I will use every minute and second to strive to improve myself.

examples.example: 即使只有一分希望，我们也要付出百分百的努力去争取成功。

translate.english: Even if there is only one percent of hope, we also have to make one hundred percent of effort to strive for success.
